archimate:Product.name: VOSviewer
archimate:Product.documentation:
VOSviewer: a software tool for constructing and visualizing bibliometric networks. The tool offers text mining functionality that can be used to construct and visualize co-occurrence networks of important terms extracted from a body of scientific literature. http://www.vosviewer.com/
Interesting for Bibliographies when writing research articles. Also illustrates usage of graph/network visualization and analysis for a specific usage.
